kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Convert To Bytes
kw.doc: Converts the given ``input`` to bytes according to the ``input_type``.

kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.
